oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Cats Like Us - 2006-12-09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances by Tony Joe White, Richard Leigh, Troy Seals and Michael Smotherman from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 9, 2006. In support of the exhibit I Can’t Stop Loving You: Ray Charles and Country Music.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tony Joe White; Richard Leigh; Troy Seals; Michael Smotherman;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Program begins in progress. Opening comments by Michael Gray. Performances include: Rainy Night In Georgia (Tony Joe White) -- Tony Joe White talks about Ray Charles -- 3/4 Time (Tony Joe White -- Cold Day In July (Richard Leigh) -- Richard talks about Ray Charles (Don't It Make My Brown Eyes Blue) -- It Ain't Gonna Worry My Mind (Richard Leigh) -- Introduction of Troy Seals -- Troy Seal talks about Ray Charles -- We Had It All (Troy Seals) -- Seven Spanish Angels (Troy Seals) -- Faithless Kind (Michael Smotherman) -- Michael Smotherman talks about Ray Charles -- Do I Ever Cross Your Mind (Michael Smotherman) -- program end.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: White, Tony Joe; Leigh, Richard; Seals, Troy; Smotherman, Michael; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
